author: San Marino Rtv
title: Giornata Mondiale contro il Lavoro Minorile: 138 milioni i bambini ancora sfruttati nel mondo
text:
In occasione della Giornata Internazionale contro il lavoro minorile, la Centrale Sindacale Unitaria di San Marino rilancia il comunicato dell’Organizzazione Internazionale del Lavoro (OIL) e dell’UNICEF, che denuncia come siano ancora 138 milioni i bambini coinvolti nel lavoro minorile, di cui 54 milioni in condizioni pericolose.
L’Africa resta l’area più colpita con 87 milioni di minori sfruttati, mentre l’Asia e il Pacifico registrano un significativo calo. La CSU, presente alla 113ª sessione dell’OIL a Ginevra con Simona Zonzini, sottolinea l’urgenza di protezione sociale, istruzione gratuita e lavoro dignitoso per gli adulti. “I bambini devono poter studiare, giocare ed essere protetti. Nessuna giustificazione può legittimare lo sfruttamento dell’infanzia”.

author: fox32news
title: Chicago woman returns from Blue Origin's space flight
text:
A Chicago woman has just returned from Blue Origins' latest space flight.
A Chicago woman has just returned from Blue Origins' latest space flight.Elaine Hyde, founder of Chicago Star Media, has dreamed of outer space since she was a little girl.Her dream became a reality Tuesday when she joined a six-person crew for a 10-minute, 3-second flight to space."It's infused me with a new perspective of how to see life and new ideas can form. I've spent a lifetime dreaming about going to space. I've tried to imagine myself there countless times.
Hyde, a dual citizen of the United States and Australia, made history as the first Australian woman and Singapore-born person to journey to space.On Thursday, Blue Origin announced its next flight will feature an all-female crew.Pop star Katy Perry, CBS anchor Gayle King, and Lauren Sanchez, the fiancé of Blue Origin owner Jeff Bezos, are set to be part of the team.

author: Amanda Lumpkin
title: Tornadoes, Flash Flooding Possible With Powerful FL Storm: Forecast
text:
[Weather](/florida/southtampa/weather)
Tornadoes, Flash Flooding Possible With Powerful FL Storm: Forecast
A potentially potent system is expected to bring severe weather from Tampa to Miami by Friday, forecasts predict.
FLORIDA — A powerful system in the Gulf of Mexico is predicted to usher severe thunderstorms and possible flash flooding into the Sunshine State this weekend.
With the
southern Plains reportedly already being rocked by the severe weather, a storm system could travel from Texas into Louisiana and eventually into the Florida Peninsula by Thursday night.
After leaving Texas, the system is expected to return to the Gulf to become "a potent storm," FOX Weather reported. This could result in heavy downpour in south Florida, Georgia and the Carolinas.
Find out what's happening in Tampawith free, real-time updates from Patch.
In Tampa Bay, spotty showers Thursday night will ramp up to
heavy downpours Friday morning that could affect the commute to work and school, WFLA said. Frequent lightning and strong winds are often part of these downpours.
Passing showers are still expected to last throughout Saturday. The threat of severe weather is lower, but there’s a 50% chance of a quick downpour.
Find out what's happening in Tampawith free, real-time updates from Patch.
Rainfall totals from Friday and Saturday should range from an inch to 2-3 inches where the heaviest downpours fall in Tampa Bay. But more rain is likely in South Florida.
Two storm systems will merge to generate drenching rain with increasing winds, building seas and rough surf from Florida to New Jersey from Friday to Saturday,
AccuWeather said.
FOX predicted moisture from the Gulf could prompt several rounds of thunderstorms in southern Florida in particular.
"Torrential rain will accompany most of the thunderstorms that develop, with an added threat of damaging wind gusts and even some tornadoes. Forecasts call for as much as 3-5 inches of rain around south Florida, which could lead to flash flooding in Miami and Fort Lauderdale," FOX reported.
The National Weather Service has showers and possible thunderstorms forecast to start after 2 a.m. Friday in the Tampa area.
With a 90 percent chance for showers, rainfall amounts could reach half an inch. Additional rainfall is predicted to come into sunny Florida through Saturday before expecting to start back up Wednesday.
The
National Weather Service forecast for Tampa:
Thursday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 83. South wind around 6 mph.
Thursday Night: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm, mainly after 2 a.m. Low around 66. West wind 5-10 mph becoming east in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 90 percent. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
Friday: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm. High near 75. Breezy, with a southeast wind 14-16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90 percent. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
Friday Night: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm before 2 a.m, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2 a.m. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 67. Breezy, with a south wind 13-17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70 percent.
Saturday: A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 8 a.m. Mostly sunny, with a high near 79. Breezy, with a west wind 9-15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
Saturday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 61. West northwest wind 11-14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Sunday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. North northeast wind 11-14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Sunday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Northeast wind 11-14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Monday: Sunny, with a high near 84. Breezy, with an east wind 13-15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.
Monday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 64.
Tuesday: Sunny, with a high near 86. Breezy.
Tuesday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 68.
Wednesday: A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 83.

author: Wendoline Adame
title: Caen narcomenudistas con armas exclusivas del Ejército en operativo en León
text:
En un operativo encabezado por el gobierno municipal de León, se llevó a cabo la detención de cuatro presuntos narcomenudistas, a los cuales adicional a la droga les fue decomisadas armas de uso exclusivo del Ejército.
Las personas fueron identificadas como Erika Janet, de 40 años, Óscar Uriel de 23 años, Miguel Ángel de 39 años y Cristian Alejandro de 25 años.
La detención se dio en la colonia 10 de mayo, Policías realizaban un recorrido sobre la calle Madre Selva, casi esquina con calle Madre Eva, cuando tuvieron a la vista dos motocicletas, a bordo de ellas cuatro personas, todas sin casco. Tras marcarles el alto, les encontraron en posesión de armas de fuego de alto poder, cartuchos útiles y droga, con lo que se presume realizaban actividades ilícitas en la zona.
En total, se les encontraron: Dos armas de fuego 9 mm, dos cargadores, 12 cartuchos útiles, un silenciador, 21 envoltorios de marihuana, una bolsa con aproximadamente 250 gramos de droga cristal y un envoltorio de la misma sustancia. Tanto lo decomisado como los detenidos y lo asegurado quedaron a disposición de la fiscalía general de la República.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes

author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
title: Bangkok Post - Sri Lanka debt overhaul harms older women
text: After defaulting on its foreign loans in early 2022, the Sri Lankan government agreed to restructure both its external and domestic debt, as required by its bailout agreement with the International Monetary Fund. The adjustment has had dire consequences for the Employees' Provident Fund (EPF), the country's largest superannuation fund, which covers nearly 60% of the private-sector and semi-government workforce.In September, the Central Bank of Sri Lank (CBSL) announced that the EPF had two options for its portfolio of treasury bonds under the domestic debt restructuring plan. The first was to increase the tax rate applied to the EPF's investment income to 30% -- more than double the current rate of 14%. The second was to exchange the treasury bonds for new ones with lower interest rates of 12% per year until 2026 and 9% after that, a sharp drop from the current average rate of more than 20%. The CBSL's Monetary Board opted for the latter, although both scenarios would have shrunk retirement savings significantly.While this is bad news for all elderly Sri Lankans, who are already the country's poorest group, it will disproportionately hurt older women. To be sure, they receive fewer benefits, given that the EPF caters to workers in formal employment, and women's participation in the labour market has consistently remained low, at 30-35%, over the last few decades. But even women without direct access to these savings often rely on them indirectly because they are financially dependent on men or collect their deceased spouse's benefits. More importantly, the feminisation of ageing has lengthened the retirement period for Sri Lanka's women, who not only live six years longer than the country's men but are also eligible to claim their benefits under the EPF at age 50, whereas men must wait until age 55.This matters because, as a defined contribution plan, the EPF provides the mandatory contributions paid by employers and employees, together with accumulated interest, as a lump sum at retirement. In 2021, the EPF paid an average benefit of around US$2,000 (71,430 baht) -- equivalent to only four years of average consumption per person. Women must, therefore, stretch this already inadequate amount over more years than men. And with lower bond yields, workers will receive an even smaller lump sum.This shows the threat domestic debt restructuring poses to women's income security and economic dependence in old age. It also highlights the importance of safeguarding pension funds to ensure the welfare of elderly people more generally. Instead of treating all treasury bonds equally, Sri Lanka's restructuring plan targeted those held by retirement funds (as opposed to financial institutions or private stakeholders). Moreover, EPF beneficiaries could not push back against this policy as neither employees nor employers have a say in the fund's management.To improve transparency, the EPF board must be restructured to ensure that member interests are represented in the decision-making process. After all, beneficiaries bear the risk of mismanagement. Employers and employees of both genders could hold the board accountable for its investment portfolio, 93.4% of which was in rupee loans, treasury bonds, and treasury bills in 2020, and resist changes that reduce their retirement savings.The law that established the EPF should be changed to make the retirement age the same for men and women and to establish crediting mechanisms for periods of childcare. Sri Lanka should also spur more competition in the retirement fund market, which would give beneficiaries more choices and, in turn, encourage more service-oriented fund management. Finally, individuals should be given a greater say in managing their pensions. In the long term, ensuring the economic welfare of older women in Sri Lanka requires thoughtful and adequately financed measures to improve their access to formal-sector employment. ©2024 Project SyndicateNisha Arunatilake, Director of Research at the Institute of Policy Studies of Sri Lanka, is a research fellow at the Partnership for Economic Policy.

author: Christopher C.
title: Comment on Platinum Delta 8 Vape – 2ml Disposable by Christopher C.
text:
Introducing 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 Disposable Vapes: Unmatched Purity and Potency in the World of Delta 8 THC
As the industry leader in hemp-derived cannabinoid products, 3CHI has once again set the bar high with the launch of its Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes. These revolutionary vapes offer the ultimate combination of purity, potency, and premium hardware, setting a new standard for Delta 8 THC vaping experiences.
State-of-the-Art Isolation Techniques
At the heart of 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes is the most refined Delta 8 THC oil ever produced. By utilizing state-of-the-art isolation techniques, our team of experienced scientists has achieved a remarkable 99%+ delta 8 THC purity level. This breakthrough in Delta 8 THC production allows for the cleanest and most effective vaping experience possible.
In addition to the ultra-pure delta 8 THC oil, 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes are the first to have all cannabinoids identified, further showcasing our commitment to quality, transparency, and consumer trust.
Advanced Hardware for Customized Vaping Experiences
3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes feature advanced hardware designed to deliver the perfect vaping experience for each user. The 2ml disposable vape pens come equipped with a preheat setting and three variable voltage heat settings, allowing you to tailor your vaping session to your individual preferences. The adjustable heat settings ensure that you can achieve the optimal balance of flavor, vapor production, and desired effects.
Available in Three Unique Strain Options
To cater to a diverse range of tastes and preferences, 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes are available in three carefully selected strain options:
- Skywalker (Indica): Ideal for those seeking relaxation and stress relief, Skywalker is an Indica-dominant strain known for its soothing effects. As you vape, you’ll experience a sense of calm and tranquility that helps to melt away tension and promote a state of deep relaxation.
- White Runtz (Hybrid): For those who want the best of both worlds, White Runtz is a balanced hybrid strain that offers a harmonious blend of calming and uplifting properties. This versatile strain provides the perfect mix of relaxation and invigoration, making it an excellent choice for any time of day.
- Strawberry Cough (Sativa): If you’re looking for a burst of energy and creativity, Strawberry Cough is a Sativa-dominant strain that stimulates and uplifts. With its vibrant, fruity flavor profile and mood-enhancing effects, this strain is perfect for promoting a sense of euphoria and stimulating creative thought.
Consistency and Quality: The Hallmarks of 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 Vapes
One of the key benefits of
3CHI‘s Platinum vapes is the exceptional consistency and quality of the products. By utilizing the groundbreaking D-SPEC testing method, we can accurately measure and control the concentrations of delta 8 THC, delta 4(8)-iso-THC, and delta 9 THC in our products. This precise measurement and control ensure that each batch of Platinum Delta 8 vapes delivers consistent effects and performance.
For consumers who rely on hemp-derived products for relief, consistency is crucial. With D-SPEC’s advanced testing capabilities, 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes represent a monumental leap forward in the formulation of effective and reliable cannabis products.
Superior to GC/MS and Traditional HPLC Methods
In addition to
third-party testing, 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes are tested internally using the D-SPEC method, which is more reliable than the traditional gas chromatography/mass spectrometry (GC/MS) and older high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) methods. GC/MS, though a better option than older HPLC methods, has the potential to convert THC isomers at high temperatures required for testing. The D-SPEC method resolves ∆4(8)-iso-THC from ∆8-THC and ∆9-THC peaks on the chromatogram using HPLC, making it an incredibly accurate way to determine delta 8 THC concentrations, delta 4(8)-iso-THC concentrations, delta 9 THC concentrations, and legal compliance of a product.
This advanced testing method ensures that 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes meet the highest standards of quality, safety, and legal compliance. D-SPEC testing also addresses the issue of inaccurate testing reports in the hemp industry, particularly for vape products. By accurately separating the peaks of ∆4(8)-iso-THC, ∆8-THC, and ∆9-THC, D-SPEC eliminates both overestimations and underestimations of ∆9-THC content in hemp products, ensuring that truly compliant products are correctly identified and that non-compliant products are not misrepresented as compliant.
The Future of Delta 8 THC Vaping
3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes represent the future of Delta 8 THC vaping, offering unmatched purity, potency, and advanced hardware for a truly exceptional vaping experience. With three unique strain options, customizable heat settings, and a commitment to quality and consistency backed by the revolutionary D-SPEC testing method, 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes are the ultimate choice for discerning consumers seeking the best in delta 8 THC products.
Experience the purest and most potent Delta 8 vapes ever made with 3CHI’s Platinum Delta 8 disposable vapes. Order yours today and discover the difference that superior quality and advanced technology can make in your vaping experience.
About our Delta 8 Platinum Disposable Vape
- 2ml total
- No VG, PG, PEG, Vitamin E, MCT, or any other cutting agent or harmful additives
- No heavy metals shown in lab test results
This is a pure, concentrated vape product. It may be harsh on the throat for those who are not accustomed to concentrated cannabinoid products. How many puffs should I start with? Delta 8 THC is known to be a harsh cannabinoid. For first-time users and veterans alike, it’s recommended to start slow – take a small puff to start with. Generally, taking 1-2 smaller puffs is ok once you have gauged your individual THC tolerance. Do not exceed 3 seconds per puff.
CLICK TO GO TO LAB TESTING PAGE
Delta 8 Platinum Disposable Vape Description
- Description: Button-activated, 3-heat variable voltage disposable pen with preheat setting with 2ml total oil.
- Serving Size: One puff
- Servings per Vape Cartridge: varies depending on the size of puffs
- Coil: Ceramic
- Tank: Polycarbonate
- Ingredients: Platinum Δ8THC oil and strain-specific terpenes of your choice
- ∆8THC Oil Component Purity: 99%+ Delta 8 THC
- Origin Material: Hemp
- ∆9THC Content: <0.3%
- Cannabis-Derived Terpenes: Yes
Delta 8 Vape Cartridge Directions
After unpackaging your Platinum ∆8 Disposable Vape, remove all silicon covers. Quickly press the button 5 times to turn the device on and off. Quickly press the button 3 times to change heat settings, green is the lowest setting and red is the highest setting. Press the button 2 times quickly to use the preheat setting.
DO NOT DRIVE OR OPERATE ANY MACHINERY WHILE USING THIS PRODUCT!
Consult a physician before using this product. Do not use if pregnant, nursing, or if you have any diagnosed or undiagnosed medical condition / serious medical condition. Must be 21 years or older to purchase Delta 8 thc or use Delta 8 THC. Delta 8 THC must be legal in your state or territory to purchase or use.
Important Product Notes
- DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT IN ANY MANNER NOT RECOMMENDED BY A DOCTOR.
- This Delta 8 disposable may affect blood pressure, heart rate, and/or intraocular pressure in some people. If you have any known or unknown heart, blood pressure, eye, eye pressure, or similar/related issues, do not use this product unless recommended by a doctor.
- Do not use this product if pregnant or nursing.
- If you have known allergies, please check test results for any possible issues with terpenes. For example, pinene is found in pine and beta-caryophyllene is found in pepper.
- Delta 8 THC will likely cause you to fail a drug test. Do not use this product if you need to pass a drug test.
- This Delta 8 vape cart can be intoxicating to some people. Do not drive or operate any machinery while using this product. Consult a doctor before using this product.
- There is supposed to be air at the top of the tank. Over time the oil (vape juice) gradually soaks into the coil area creating space at the top of the tank. This can be as much as 40% of the total amount, which can make tanks appear partly unfilled.
- Our Delta 8 THC vape is federally legal and legal according to many state laws. Our Delta 8 THC oil is 100% derived from hemp and does not contain more than 0.3% Delta 9 THC. 3CHI is not responsible for knowing whether this product is legal in your state or territory and you assume full responsibility for all liabilities pertaining to your purchase.
Age Requirements
All purchases of 3CHI delta 8 vape carts require age verification for retail customers only. Please follow the Age Verification step-by-step instructions at checkout to verify your age and continue with your purchase. Some purchases may require proof of photo identification. For all questions regarding this, please contact our support team
here.
Shipping Exclusions
Like all reputable brands, 3CHI retains the right to not ship Delta 8 vapes to any state or territories where local laws conflict with H.R. 2: The Agricultural Improvement Act of 2018, also known as the 2018 Farm Bill. While most states have legalized Delta 8 and Delta 8 vape carts, there are states where Delta 8 is either illegal or not explicitly legal according to state laws. We do not ship out products to the following states because of state bans or conflicting laws surrounding Delta 8 THC: Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Idaho, Iowa, Montana, Nevada, North Dakota, Rhode Island, Utah, and Vermont.
If your state laws have recently been updated, or you feel there is language supporting Delta 8 THC’s legality in your state, please reach out to us at
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#aad9dfdadac5d8deea99c9c2c384c9c5c7) to speak to one of our excellent customer service representatives. Be sure to include excerpts from the bill supporting your case, as well as links to the full-text versions of the state laws for our review.

author: Miriam, Vázquez Vázquez
title: Pedro Sánchez celebra la ruptura de los gobiernos de Vox y el PP y avanza una oposición constructiva: "Es un gran día para España"
text:
Ruptura de los gobiernos autonómicos de Vox y el PP
Pedro Sánchez celebra la ruptura de los gobiernos de Vox y el PP y avanza una oposición constructiva: "Es un gran día para España"
Vox ha decidido romper los gobiernos autonómicos que tenía con el PP y Sánchez ha celebrado la noticia a la par que ha subrayado que "la estrategia de Feijóo de gobernar con la ultraderecha ha fracasado".
Publicidad
"Hoy es un gran día para España", así de optimista ha celebrado Pedro Sánchez la ruptura de los gobiernos autonómicos de Vox y el PP. Desde Washington, y en una rueda de prensa al finalizar la cumbre de la OTAN el presidente ha avanzado que pedirá a Alberto Núñez Feijóo, que derogue las "contrarreformas" aprobadas durante este año y además que rompa los pactos con la formación de Santiago Abascal en los ayuntamientos.
Sánchez se ha comprometido a hacer una oposición "constructiva". "Allí donde está el PSOE de oposición ha hecho oposición constructiva siempre. Dependerá de las políticas autonómicas del Gobierno de turno el que cuente con el apoyo, o no, del PSOE".
El líder del Ejecutivo ha subrayado que "la estrategia de Feijóo de gobernar con la ultraderecha ha fracasado" y enfatiza: "Es una gran noticia". Sánchez ha reconocido que no puede "ocultar mi alegría, mi felicidad. Los beneficiarios de la salida de la ultraderecha de los gobiernos autonómicos somos todos y sobre todo todas."
Avisa de que en los próximos días habrá mucha "politiquería" para interpretar a quién beneficia o perjudica esta nueva situación pero, según ha señalado "los beneficiarios netos de la salida de la ultraderecha de los gobiernos autonómicos es la mayoría social de españoles y españolas".
Eso sí, entre esta alegría Sánchez ha querido destacar que esta ha sido
una decisión de Vox y no del PP por lo que pide a los de Feijóo que rompa con las políticas que ha aprobado con los de Abascal hasta el día de hoy.
En primer lugar le exige que acepte la reforma de la Ley de Extranjería para que el reparto de menores migrantes entre las comunidades autónomas sea obligatorio. Dice que esa sería "la prueba del algodón" de que el PP "ha roto con las políticas de Vox".
Sánchez ha reiterado que es una gran noticia para los españoles, porque estos gobiernos han aprobado políticas "ultraderechistas" en materias como violencia de género, memoria democrática, servicios sociales y calidad de servicios públicos, transición ecológica y también sobre cambio climático, según ha enumerado.
Vox acordó salir de todos los gobiernos autonómicos de coalición con el PP por lo que Abascal ha considerado una "agresión" de Alberto Núñez Feijóo al "obligar" a las comunidades a aceptar
el reparto menores migrantes no acompañados.
Se retira así el partido de Abascal de los ejecutivos de Castilla y León, Aragón, Comunidad Valenciana, Extremadura y Murcia para pasar a ser en estas comunidades una oposición "leal y contundente", y rompe el pacto de investidura en Baleares. Abascal ha argumentado que "es imposible pactar con el que no quiere hacerlo" y ha acusado a Feijóo de "imponer políticas de fronteras abiertas" al tiempo que ha advertido de que "nadie ha votado" a Vox ni al PP para que se mantenga la "invasión" de emigración ilegal y de menores no acompañados en España.
Síguenos en nuestro
canal de WhatsApp y no te pierdas la última hora y toda la actualidad de antena3noticias.com.
Publicidad
